A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Humor was terrible and in places where it shouldn't have been. Way too many plot holes and lack of caring about the background of characters. Made it so Rey has no Jedi background so that Disney can keep milking the shit out of the Star Wars franchise more than Luke milked those space cows. Oh\, and if you like Capitalism\, the Casino scene pretty much shits on that too. Disney\, please make a Star Wars movie that cares more about creating a background for several characters than creating a story that tells more about anti-capitalism and SJW ideals.
